p: Enrichment analyses of the specifically temperature-pH DEGs were generated for each coral species (see in Fig. S5 Venn diagram the 5,984 and 4,857 unique temperature-pH genes of S. pistillata and B. europaea, respectively) and compared to the matching temperature treatment (unique sty6pH to sty6 and unique bala12pH to bala12) ( Tables S4 and S5). This analysis revealed that as expected 22 23, transport processes were modified by temperature and pH in both corals, but in S. pistillata there was an effect on protein degradation while the response to stress in B. europaea involved metabolic processes.
